title: The lyfe of the most godly, valeant and noble capteine and maintener of the trew Christian religion in Fraunce, Iasper Colignie Shatilion, sometyme greate admirall of Fraunce. Translated out of Latin by Arthur Golding
author: Golding, Arthur, 1536-1606.
notes: A translation of: Gasparis Colinii Castilloni, magni quondam Franciae amerallii, vita.
Sometimes attributed to Jean de Serres, to Jean Hotman, seigneur de Villers-Saint-Paul, and to Fran√ßois Hotman.
Running title reads: The life of Iasper Colignie.
The last two leaves are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
